org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.security

Class AbstractEncryptionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.security.AbstractEncryptionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncryptionService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PassphraseEncryptionServices, PasswordEncryptionServices

    public abstract class AbstractEncryptionService
extends Object
implements EncryptionService
    This class will manage Instance and Application scoped IVs.
